name: log_event
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . authority . is_signer , CustomError :: Unauthorized) ;
ctx . accounts . storage . data = ctx . accounts . storage . data . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("Logged Event [{}] from {} | Count: {}" , event_name , ctx . accounts . authority . key () , ctx . accounts . storage . data) ;

name: clear_history
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . authority . is_signer , CustomError :: Unauthorized) ;
msg ! ("Event history cleared by {}" , ctx . accounts . authority . key ()) ;

name: check_event_limit
body: let count = ctx . accounts . storage . data ;
msg ! ("Event Count = {} | Limit = {} | Over Limit = {}" , count , limit , over) ;
